clauses.title: You waive your moral rights
clauses.description:
Moral rights are rights to creators of literary, dramatic, musical and artistic works, as well as directors of films.
"The moral rights include the right of attribution, the right to have a work published anonymously or pseudonymously, and the right to the integrity of the work. The preserving of the integrity of the work allows the author to object to alteration, distortion, or mutilation of the work that is "prejudicial to the author's honor or reputation". Anything else that may detract from the artist's relationship with the work even after it leaves the artist's possession or ownership may bring these moral rights into play. Moral rights are distinct from any economic rights tied to copyrights. Even if an artist has assigned his or her copyright rights to a work to a third party, he or she still maintains the moral rights to the work." -Wikipedia
In general, any terms that use the exact words "moral rights" as rights that are waived will fall under this Case.
clauses.clause_text:
You also hereby waive
any moral
rights you may have in your User Submissions

case.text: You waive your moral rights

clauses.title: The service can delete specific content without reason and may do it without prior notice
clauses.description: This service can delete specific content. Usually they will claim they reserve the right to do it at their sole discretion, which is legalese for saying they won't give a specific reason. If the terms say they will not notify you, it shall be included in the quote but if it does not explicitly say they will give you a notice, it can be reasonably inferred that they can do it without telling you.
clauses.clause_text:
FanFiction.Net reserves the right to remove Content and User Submissions
without
prior notice.

case.text: Specific content can be deleted without reason and may be removed without prior notice

clauses.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted
clauses.description: Content may remain in backup servers and be retained after deletion, and thus never be completely deleted. This case doesn't apply to contributions that can't be removed due to the nature of the service.
clauses.clause_text:
You understand and agree,
however, that FanFiction.Net may retain, but not display, distribute, or perform, server
copies
of User Submissions that have been removed or deleted.

case.text: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text:
FanFiction.Net reserves the right to amend these Terms of Service at any time
and
without notice,

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Users have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service
clauses.description: If you wish to bring legal action against a service about a past incident, you may not be able to do so if the Terms you agreed to implied a limited amount of time. As a result it may be worthy to carefully read that section of the Terms to know exactly how much time you might have before your right to take legal action expires.
clauses.clause_text:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LOCAL LAW, YOU
AND FanFiction.Net AGREE THAT ANY CAUSE OF ACTION ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO
THE FanFiction.Net SERVICE MUST COMMENCE WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION
ACCRUES.
OTHERWISE, SUCH CAUSE OF ACTION IS PERMANENTLY BARRED

case.text: You have a reduced time period to take legal action against the service

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your data
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: For clarity, you retain all of your ownership rights in your User Submissions.

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: Users can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much
clauses.description: Automated web scraping is a method of extracting information from a website. The service authorises scraping if it doesn't impact its server(s) too much.
clauses.clause_text:
You agree not to use or launch any automated system, including without limitation, "robots,"
"spiders,"
or "offline readers," that accesses the Service in a manner that sends more request messages to
the FanFiction.Net servers in a given period of time than a human can reasonably produce
in the
same period by using a conventional on-line web browser.

case.text: You can scrape the site, as long as it doesn't impact the server too much

clauses.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
clauses.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.
clauses.clause_text:
Take the following steps to disable interest-based ads:
  • On a browser, you can visit the Digital Advertising Alliance’s consumer choice tool at https://optout.aboutads.info to opt out of seeing interest-based advertising.
  • On an iOS device, enable the “Limit Ad Tracking” setting in your iOS phone’s settings.
  • On an Android device, enable “Opt out of Ads Personalization” in your Android phone’s settings.

case.text: You can opt out of targeted advertising

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
• We take appropriate security measures to protect against unauthorized access to or unauthorized alteration, disclosure or destruction of data.
  • When applicable, we use industry standard encryption to protect the communication between all compatible devices and our services.
  • We restrict access to your personally identifying information to site staffs who need to know that information in order to operate, develop or improve our services.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.
clauses.clause_text:

submitting
User Submissions to FanFiction.Net, you hereby grant FanFiction.Net a
worldwide,
non-exclusive, royalty-free, transferable license to use, reproduce, distribute, display, and
perform the
User Submissions in connection with the FanFiction.Net Service.

case.text: The service has non-exclusive use of your content

You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless FanFiction.Net, its parent corporation,
officers, directors, employees and agents, from and against any and all claims, demands, causes of
action,
damages, obligations, losses, liabilities, costs or debt, and expenses, (including but not limited
to
reasonable legal fees)

case.text: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

clauses.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.
clauses.clause_text: Last Updated Feb 12, 2019

case.text: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text: To disable the usage cookies, you can modify your device browser to accept or deny cookies or to request your permission each time a site attempts to set a cookie. Please note our services may not be fully accessible when cookies are disabled.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

assumes no
responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third party websites or services.

case.text: This service assumes no responsibility and liability for the contents of links to other websites

clauses.title: They may stop providing the service at any time
clauses.description: They may discontinue the services without prior notice, at any time, for any or no reason. They usually assume no liability for losses and damages resulting from this suspension.
clauses.clause_text:
FanFiction.Net reserves the right to discontinue any aspect of
the FanFiction.Net Service at any time.

case.text: They may stop providing the service at any time

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: YOU AGREE THAT YOUR USE OF THE FanFiction.Net SERVICE SHALL BE AT YOUR SOLE RISK.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text:
You affirm that you are
over the
age of 13, as the FanFiction.Net Service is not intended for children under 13.

clauses.title: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites
clauses.description: The service states that whenever it links to third party websites or applications, its privacy policy does not apply. Those third party websites or applications hosted or operated by other organizations may have their own privacy policies.
clauses.clause_text:

activities of, external web sites/services.

case.text: The service informs you that its privacy policy does not apply to third party websites

clauses.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

on your
account, and you must keep your account password secure.

case.text: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.

of these
Terms of Service is deemed invalid by a court of competent jurisdiction, the invalidity of such
provision
shall not affect the validity of the remaining provisions of these Terms of Service, which shall
remain in
full force and effect.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
clauses.description: Even if the service does not or not always enforce all of the rules or provisions contained in its terms, they still apply. Users can at a later time still be held accountable for violating provisions that have not been enforced consistently.

any
right or provision under these Terms of Service shall not constitute a waiver of such right or
provision.

case.text: Failure to enforce any provision of the Terms of Service does not constitute a waiver of such provision
